game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Workshop, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Includes level editor, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 멜라토닌은 꿈과 현실이 하나가 되는 리듬 게임입니다. 부담스러운 오버레이나 인터페이스를 배제하고, 놀라운 도전과 손 그림, 생동감 넘치는 음악만이 어우러진 다양한 꿈의 세계를 여행해 보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Melatonin is a rhythm game about dreams and reality merging together. It uses animations and sound cues to keep you on beat without any intimidating overlays or interfaces. Harmonize through a variety of dreamy levels containing surprising challenges, hand-drawn art, and vibrant music.

reviewHighlights.text: I like the idea and the art style of the game. It's designed with a lot of love and feels very cozy. But playing the game just didn't feel fun for me....
This review is kind of ruined by Steam's lack of a middleground recommendation option but the god outweighs the bad so oh well. This game is good, but...
